main.name: Mark Solters
main.description: I have been making web sites since I was in 3rd grade.  Not this one though. I forked the first "react resume" repo in a Google search, added a Dockerfile (which came to me in a dream), CD'd it to a personal k8s cluster with Skaffold and then Terraformed a DNS record for the load balancer
main.bio: I have a background in physics, robotics, IoT and software engineering.  As a young child I displayed an exceptional virtuosity for turning things off, and then, after some period of time, back on.  This natural gift let me to my work today in DevOps automating a variety of containerized cloud platforms and CI/CD pipelines emanating thereof.  I have on-call MongoDB, MySQL, MariaDB and k8s experience.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: My skills levels are scraped directly by a k8s-hosted Prometheus pod every 10 seconds.

education.description: Worked in the Axion Dark Matter EXperiment (ADMX) research lab while an undergraduate, dealing with ultra-cold electronics design.  Participated in a 3-month long research internship programming software to analyze navigation and sensor data onboard particle detectors in low-altitude Earth orbit.

work.title: Staff Engineer
work.description: Design, develop, operate and manage cloud services continuously deployed to Kubernetes.  Provide on-call incident response.  Architect policies and software that automate and stabilize a large and diverse ecosystem of devs sharing Git-based projects, providing DevOps guidance and support.

work.title: Lead Developer
work.description: Mesh-connected IoT water management and control technology.  Implemented realtime web app in JS & embedded firmware in C.  Work closely with EE and mech design teams; agile software and robotics development.

projects.title: app-top
projects.category: A YAML document sandbox that lets you construct dependecy graphs, as of distributed cloud architectures

projects.title: Contiki OTA
projects.category: Over-the-air firmware update feature for ContikiOS

projects.title: yamlamadingdong
projects.category: This is the one that'll get me that Nobel.  Navigate your YAML and JSON files in 3D, the way the Good Lord intended.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
